ops.raw: d0 5a 00 75 ff ab fc fe 00 75 ff ab fc

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Over the course of many years,
Mako energy crystallizes into
Materia…
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // Received "Knights of the Round" Materia!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // You cannot take on more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

Over the course of many years,
Mako energy crystallizes into
Materia…

You cannot take on more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.
